statements: DELETE FROM LoyaltyProgramData WHERE user_name = 'John Smith';
DELETE FROM LoyaltyProgramData WHERE user_id = 100 AND user_name = 'Alice';
DELETE FROM rewards WHERE reward_id = 100 AND expiration_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM frequent_users WHERE loyalty_points <= 1000 AND user_name LIKE 'A%';
